## Loading R Packages

In the code chunk below, [`p_load()`](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/pacman/versions/0.5.1/topics/p_load) of [`pacman`](https://trinker.github.io/pacman/vignettes/Introduction_to_pacman.html) package is used to load tidyverse, ggdist, ggthemes family of packages.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggdist, ggthemes, ggridges, colorspace)
```
:::


## Importing the data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


## Density Plot

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=Exam_data, 
       aes(x = ENGLISH)) +
  geom_density(
    color = "#1696d2",
    adjust = .65,
    alpha = .6
    )  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
